admin/editor.product-search.title: Product search context
admin/editor.product-search.maxItemsPerP: Maximum number of items per page
admin/store.advancedSettings.customHeade: Enter the ID to identify your header. Example: My new custom header
Enter the key for your header, following HTTP patterns. Example: Strict-Transport-Security
Enter the value for your key, following HTTP patterns. Example: max-age=<expire-time>
